achievements.name: Parks, Benches, and Sonatas
achievements.desc: Obtain the "Repertoire of Myriad Melodies" and become a free-spirited musician.

achievements.name: A Treatise on the Fundamental Principles of Lyre Playing
achievements.desc: Complete all "Introductory Exercises" in the "Repertoire of Myriad Melodies."

achievements.name: Twenty-Five Groschen...
achievements.desc: Redeem 1 score themes in the "Treasure of Myriad Melodies."

achievements.name: Twenty-Five Groschen...
achievements.desc: Redeem 3 score themes in the "Treasure of Myriad Melodies."

achievements.name: Twenty-Five Groschen...
achievements.desc: Redeem 5 score themes in the "Treasure of Myriad Melodies."

achievements.name: The Melody's Trajectory
achievements.desc: Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 5 different official music scores.

achievements.name: The Melody's Trajectory
achievements.desc: Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 15 different official music scores.

achievements.name: The Melody's Trajectory
achievements.desc: Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 30 different official music scores.

achievements.name: The Art of the Canon
achievements.desc: Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 5 different music scores by other players.

achievements.name: The Art of the Canon
achievements.desc: Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 10 different music scores by other players.

achievements.name: The Art of the Canon
achievements.desc: Reach a performance rating of Discantus for 20 different music scores by other players.
